title: Fresh chimichurri sauce
ingredients: ['120ml olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, chopped, or more to taste', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar, or more to taste', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon crushed chilli flakes', '1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '25g fresh coriander leaves', '25g fresh oregano leaves', '1 bunch flat leaf parsley, stems removed']
